samples.sample: This sample shows how to set a style for point vector layers. Click the button below to switch to another random color.
This sample shows how to set a style for area vector layers. Click the button below to switch to another random color.
This sample shows how to set a style for line vector layers. Click the button below to switch to another random color.
This sample shows how to set a label style for vector layers. Click the button below to switch to another random color.
This sample shows how to set a heat style for vector layers. Use combobox select theme, and another combox to change heat point size.
